Achievements.Name: Break Out
Achievements.Description: Score a goal on a breakaway on Amateur difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Can't Keep Me Down
Achievements.Description: Score a goal when 2 men down on Pro difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Revenge (Glitched Achievement)
Achievements.Description: Score a penalty shot on All-Star difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Fast Start
Achievements.Description: Score a goal in the first minute of play on All-Star difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Blueline Tally
Achievements.Description: Score a goal with a defenseman on Pro difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Champions
Achievements.Description: Win the Stanley Cup in Franchise on Pro difficulty or higher.

Achievements.Name: Dominance
Achievements.Description: Win Stanley Cup and Presidents Trophy in the same year in Franchise on Pro difficulty or higher.

Achievements.Name: Dynasty
Achievements.Description: Win 3 Stanley Cups in a row in Franchise on Pro difficulty or higher.

Achievements.Name: Brick Wall
Achievements.Description: Record 5 consecutive shutouts in Franchise mode on Pro difficulty or higher.

Achievements.Name: No Mercy!
Achievements.Description: Win a game by 10 or more goals on Pro difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: No Favorites
Achievements.Description: Play a game with every NHL team.

Achievements.Name: Miracle!
Achievements.Description: Beat USSR 80 with USA 80 on Pro difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Starry Night
Achievements.Description: Earn all 3 stars on Rookie difficulty or higher in a single-player game.

Achievements.Name: Online Champion
Achievements.Description: Win an online league with at least 8 players.
